sourcesContent: import _slicedToArray from"@babel/runtime/helpers/slicedToArray";import React from"react";import Konva from"konva";import{useFinetune}from"../../../hooks";import restrictNumber from"../../../utils/restrictNumber";import Slider from"../../common/Slider";var MIN_VALUE=0,DEFAULT_VALUE={blurRadius:0},MAX_VALUE=100,sliderStyle={width:150,padding:0},BlurOptions=function(){var a,b=useFinetune(Konva.Filters.Blur,DEFAULT_VALUE),c=_slicedToArray(b,2),d=c[0],e=c[1];return React.createElement(Slider,{className:"FIE_blur-option",min:MIN_VALUE,max:MAX_VALUE,value:null!==(a=d.blurRadius)&&void 0!==a?a:DEFAULT_VALUE.blurRadius,onChange:function changeValue(a){e({blurRadius:restrictNumber(a,MIN_VALUE,MAX_VALUE)})},style:sliderStyle})};export default BlurOptions;
